issue.title: [Java] Dockerize Java builds in Travis CI, run multiple JDKs in single entry
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5466](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5466). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JDK 9 and 11 builds are fast – 4 minutes each. It would probably be more efficient to run all 3 JDK builds in a single build entry
